conclusion: Analyze current positions of objects and shadows to predict changes.
Object 1 (Egg): Shadow cast to the left.
Object 2 (Apple): Shadow cast to the right.
Object 4 (Microphone): Shadow cast to the left.
Moving light source to the right changes shadow direction.
Shadows to the left will move to the right.
Shadows to the right will move to the left.
Shadows below objects will move above them.
Shadow A will move to the right of the egg.
Shadow B will move to the left of the apple.
Shadow C will move above the baseball.
Shadow D will move to the right of the microphone.
Final answer: Shadows will move as predicted based on light source shift.
